|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8365MB; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = AC:9E:17 |oui = AC:9E:17

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RT-AC88U REV 5.01" and "1517" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2807076 board].
DFS certification and VHT80+80 support were added with a C2PC request on 3/6/2019. :Actual support would probably need to come from a firmware update. The first page of the DFS Test Report lists two manufacturers: [[Askey]] and [[Compal]].
*Differences between the three models covered by this FCC certification :are described in the DFS Test Report as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! style="text-align:left;"| Model No. ! LAN Port ! Heat sink color |- |'''RT-AC88U''' |8 LAN ports |Silver, Red |- |[[ASUS RT-AC3100|RT-AC3100]] |4 LAN ports |Silver, Black |- |[[ASUS RT-AC88R|RT-AC88R]] |8 LAN ports |Silver, Red |}
*Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{see also|ASUS RT-AC3100|Arcadyan}} {{FCC ST|11/22/2015|indexme.}}
===Power supply=== *Power Supply: ([http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC88U/specifications/ Spec.]) :AC Input : 110V~240V (50~60Hz) :DC Output : 19 V with max. 2.37 A current Adding three adapters ([http://forum.ixbt.com/post.cgi?id=attach:14:63125:187:1.jpg modification]). Models: ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2624118 FCC Doc]) *ADP-45BW B (100V~240V AC (50~60 Hz) 1.2A, 19V DC / 2.37A) *ADP-65BW B (100V~240V AC (50~60 Hz) 1.5A, 19V DC / 3.42A) *AD883J20 (100V~240V AC (50~60 Hz) 1.0A, 19V DC / 2.37A)
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/arinc9/openwrt/releases/tag/v21.02.2-asus_rt-ac88u Supported by an unofficial fork of '''OpenWRT''' (''openwrt-arinc9'')] ===News=== *[http://www.cnet.com/products/asus-rt-ac88u-router/ ''Asus unveils the RT-AC88U, its first 8-port MU-MIMO Wi-Fi router'' on '''C|Net'''] *[http://www.techhive.com/article/2991380/home-networking/asus-gamer-centric-rt-ac88u-packs-more-ethernet-ports-than-any-other-80211ac-router.html ''Asus RT-AC88U packs more ethernet ports 802.11ac router'' on '''Techhive'''] *[http://www.pcper.com/news/Networking/ASUS-RT-AC88U-MU-MIMO-Router-8-Port-Switch ''ASUS RT-AC88U MU-MIMO Router with 8-Port Switch'' on '''PCper'''] (Spec.)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32910-asus-rt-ac88u-dual-band-wireless-ac3100-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC88U Wireless-AC3100 Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709C0(KFEBG) Dual-Core @1.4GHz :*Flash: 128 MB (NAND), RAM: 512MB (DDR3) :*2.4GHZ Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4366 4x4 802.11ac ::[[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4 GHz power amp (x4) ::[[Skyworks]] SKY85201-11 2.4GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4366 4x4 802.11ac ::[[RFMD]] RFPA5542 5 GHz PA module (x4) ::[[Skyworks]] SKY85605-11 5GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA (x4) :*Switch: 4x GbE in BCM4709C0 + 4x GbE in [[Realtek]] RTL8365MB *[https://lookgadgets.com/10-best-wireless-routers/#1_Asus_RT-AC88U_Feature-packed_router_with_excellent_performance ''Asus RT-AC88U Wireless-AC3100 Gigabit Router'' on '''LookGadgets'''] *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac88u.shtml ''Asus RT-AC88U Wireless-AC3100 Gigabit Router'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) *[http://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/216-asus-rt-ac88u.html ''Asus RT-AC88U'' review on '''FoxNetwork''' ('''FoxNetLab''')] (RU) *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/asus/rtac88u_rog/ ''Asus RT-AC88U AC3100 ROG'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL)
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/maylyn-networking-asus-rt-ac88u.27534/ ''ASUS RT-AC88U'' on '''SNB''' forums] :[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ac3100.27717/ ''ASUS RT-AC3100'' on '''SNB''' forums] :[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-rt-ac5300-leak.23606/ ''ASUS RT-AC5300'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=288784 ''Asus RT-AC88U'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] :[ftp://ftp.dd-wrt.com/betas/2016/01-13-2016-r28788/asus-rt-ac88u/ ''DD-WRT FW beta'' on '''ftp.dd-wrt.com'''] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/openwrt-support-for-asus-rt-ac88u/78635 ''Asus RT-AC88U'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums]
===Misc=== *[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s889428 PR on '''Broadcom'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets PR on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://pcdiy.asus.com/2015/10/nine-things-to-take-away-from-rog-unleashed/ On '''PCdiy ASUS''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = rt-ac88u build 27944 20151009 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Asus_RT-AC88U Install Guide]
Please insert instructions here

===Flashing Tomato=== Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/158-asus-rt-ac88u/ ''Gallery'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (images) *[http://www.legitreviews.com/asus-reinvigorates-pc-gaming-at-rog-unleashed_173515 On '''LegitReviews'''] (images) <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:ASUS RT-AC88U top.jpg| File:ASUS RT-AC88U rear.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==Notes== ===Features=== <small> *Broadcom 1.4 GHz Dual-core ARM processor improves USB and WAN/LAN speed *802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi router boosts speeds up to 3167Mbps for low-latency :online gaming, smooth 4K UHD video playback and extremely fast file-sharing *Broadcom ''acqam'' technology boosts 5 GHz (2167Mbps) and 2.4 GHz (1Gbps) *4x4 antenna design with ''AiRadar'' universal beamforming for unrivaled Wi-Fi range *Revolutionary ''MU-MIMO'' technology can connect multiple ''MU-MIMO''-compatible :clients at each deviceâ€™s maximum speed simultaneously *''ASUS Router App'' lets control network anywhere, without needing to boot up a PC *Exclusive built-in game accelerator from ''WTFast'' lets you enjoy smooth gameplay :in supported multi-player online games *''AiProtection'' with ''Trend Micro'' for triple-strength network security, plus robust :Parental Controls and Privacy Protection *8 Gigabit LAN ports for extensive connectivity, Link Aggregation for up to 2Gbps :wired network speeds, so devices can enjoy faster access </small>
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 BCM47094] @1.4 GHz (''ARM Cortex A9'') *Flash: 128 MB (NAND), RAM: 512 MB (DDR3) :''ESMT'' F59L1G81LA-25T 1x 128MB (NAND) :''ESMT'' M15F2G16128A-BDB (2x ??) 256MB (DDR3) ([http://forum.ixbt.com/post.cgi?id=attach:14:63125:187:1.jpg Mod]) *Wi-Fi: 4x4 MU-MIMO, acqam, Dual Band, 2.4/5 GHz *WLAN: 2x [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] SoC 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac ([http://www.pcper.com/news/Networking/ASUS-RT-AC88U-MU-MIMO-Router-8-Port-Switch Spec.]) *PA: 4x [[Skyworks]] SE2623L (2.4 GHz), 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 (5 GHz) *LNA: 4x ''[[NXP]] (SiGe)'' BGU7224<!-- /LXS5563 (DPDT switch ??) --> (2.4 GHz), 4x ''Macom'' MAAL-011078 (5 GHz) <!-- :MAAL-011078-TR1000 MACOM RF Amplifier 700MHz-6GHz Gain 2dB NF 0.35dB OIP3 33dBm --> *Antenna: 4x 5dBi Detachable Dual Band antennas *Switch: [[Realtek]] [http://www.realtek.com/products/productsView.aspx?Langid=1&PNid=18&PFid=15&Level=5&Conn=4&ProdID=296 RTL8365MB] (4x GbE + RGMII) *Ports: 1x WAN (GbE), 8x LAN (GbE) *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 *Applications: ''ASUSWRT, AiCloud, AiProtection, DLNA'' server, :VPN server, Download Master, Guest Network, High-Power mode, :Static IP, Automatic IP, PPPoE (MPPE support), PPTP, L2TP, IPv4, IPv6
[[Category:English Documentation]]
